data.message: Sorry i forgot to tell you i love all you did to Dr Dre when he was so close to die... there is a Spanish songwritter called Alejandro Sanz that says in a song used to be my favorite when i was dead at all in two legs..."between life and dead we use to think too different"... love your FRIENDSHIP and loyalty to yours. Is the most i respect from you both and make me believe in you both as men at all. Trully ME.
